nodes.description: 巴基斯坦PTI候选人选举办公室在Razmak地区遭遇爆炸，造成至少10人受伤
nodes.support_text: Earlier this month, at least 10 people were injured in a blast at the election office of a Pakistan Tehreek-i-Insaf (PTI) candidate in Razmak tehsil of North Waziristan tribal district.

nodes.description: MMA候选人Sherin Malik在Bannu省Takhti Kheil地区竞选时，其车队因摩托车携带的遥控炸弹爆炸受伤
nodes.support_text: MMA’s candidate from the PK-89 constituency, Sherin Malik was campaigning for elections in Takhti Kheil area of Bannu when a blast occurred targeting his convoy.

nodes.description: 爆炸导致MMA领袖及6名随行人员受伤，送医治疗且暂无武装组织宣称负责
nodes.support_text: The MMA leader along with six other people suffered injuries and were rushed to nearby DHQ hospital. There has been no immediate claim by any militant groups for the blast.
语义描述：爆炸物被植入摩托车

edges.support_text: when a blast occurred targeting his convoy
语义描述中的temporal_order为1，需体现爆炸物植入与车队爆炸的先后关系
